incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved. We thank you for your patience.

We are currently monitoring a disruption in third party payment providers. We will update you with any information as it becomes available.

incidents.name: RESOLVED: Credit Card Payment Issues

incident_updates.body: This issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience and understanding as we worked to resolve this issue.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

We are continuing to investigate this issue.

This issue can be resolved be reenabling the payment provider. More information can be found on our support page.

https://support.wix.com/en/article/2-august-2022-issues-accepting-credit-cards-for-online-transactions
We are currently investigating an issue with accepting credit cards for online transactions.

incidents.name: RESOLVED: Major Issue with PayPal Checkout

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved on PayPal's side. Thank you for your patience in this matter.

Some website visitors may experience issues when trying to checkout with PayPal. PayPal is currently investigating the issue.

Please follow along at https://www.paypal-status.com/product/production

incidents.name: Minor Issue with 2 factor authentication via sms

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

Some website owners in the US who are using 2-factor authentication may experience issues getting the SMS verification code.
The problem is related to the Twilio outage, as posted on their status page - https://status.twilio.com
As a workaround, those users will get the code via email instead of the SMS.
